eventParts.text: Oh! I'm so sorry, please don't hurt me!
We're not going to hurt you! Are you okay?
I'm sorry, you looked so big and tough I thought you were vultures at first!
I’m not sure that’s a compliment.
What are you doing out here all alone? It’s dangerous!
I’m looking for someone. I… He usually sends me letters, but I haven’t heard anything from him in a couple of weeks. I’m worried.
We’re heading toward the vulture lands to find some thieves who stole our seeds. Do you want to come with us?
Oh, thank you! That’s the same direction I was heading. I’ll try not to get in your way.
Don’t worry about it. I’m sure you’ll be a great addition to our group!
And I’m sure we’ll find the person you’re looking for! Let’s go!
